comment.author: 94163223@N00
comment._content: Lokatie: De Waag op de Nieuwmarkt

comment.author: 82967752@N00
comment._content: The Waag (weighing house) on the Nieuwmarkt in Amsterdam. In WWII it was the collecting point for the deportation of Jews. It is in the Jewish Quarter. Take a look here for how the square looked during the war. On this square there is a memorial to four children who were shot here during WWII, one little girl was almost 5 years old. nl.tracesofwar.com/artikel/28351/Plaquette-Nieuwmarkt-Ams...
